main event: A pilot observed a very bright yellow-white light larger than stars, with an erratic trajectory, disappearing after a short time.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3-7 seconds,The object appeared from the left side of the cockpit,The observer was flying at high altitude in a DC-3 aircraft,The light was described as brighter than a meteorite,The observation occurred 30 miles south of Ketchikan, Alaska.
witness description: a pilot from Pacific Northwest Airlines
